nodes.text: Koshka Frost was a bounty hunter who originally mentored Viktor Hel. Later, along with Hel and "Doctor" Krandak, Frost successfully hunted down Devaronian pirate Melos on Ord Mantell. However, Viktor Hel had cut in Nom Lumb for a fifth of the reward in exchange for turning on his former employer Melos.

She had one blaster rifle, a pistol, and a jetpack. She also ordered Viktor Hel to leave her his weapons which had included; two knives, another pistol, several spare ammunition clips, and a few various kinds of grenades. Frost owned a Firespray-31-class patrol and attack craft.
